sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167130 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #pnsnSvngAccPnsnSvngCl# , #pnsnSvngFnnOrgnCd# , #pnsnSvngAccFnnCmp# , #pnsnSvngAccAccno# , #pnsnSvngAccPymAmt# , #ipnsnSvngAccddcAmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167130 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL=#pnsnSvngAccPnsnSvngCl# , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD=#pnsnSvngFnnOrgnCd# , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP=#pnsnSvngAccFnnCmp# , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO=#pnsnSvngAccAccno# , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT=#pnsnSvngAccPymAmt# , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT=#ipnsnSvngAccddcAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167130 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167130 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167130 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167130 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
